MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the G66 postcode area of Kirkintilloch. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 11.00am to replace faulty electrical equipment in Clarinda Court and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 1.00pm. We will update this message if this information changes We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10.36am on 25th January 2021.
